mapper.insert: insert into sp_base_csp (CSP_ID, CSP_STATUS, LOGIN_NAME, CSP_NAME, EMAIL, LINK_MAN, ORG_TEL, ORG_ADDR, POST_CODE, REMARK, PRODUCT_VERSION, USER_NUM, SECT_NUM, START_DATE, BACK_TE_NAME, REG_CSP_ID) values (#{cspId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cspStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cspName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productVersion,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sectNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{startDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{backTeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regCspId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

mapper.update:
update sp_base_csp
CSP_STATUS = #{cspStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSP_NAME = #{cspName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LINK_MAN = #{linkMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_TEL = #{orgTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_ADDR = #{orgAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POST_CODE = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_VERSION = #{productVersion,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_NUM = #{userNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SECT_NUM = #{sectNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
BACK_TE_NAME = #{backTeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_CSP_ID = #{regCspId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where CSP_ID = #{cspId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sp_base_csp set CSP_STATUS = #{cspStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSP_NAME = #{cspName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINK_MAN = #{linkMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_TEL = #{orgTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_ADDR = #{orgAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POST_CODE = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_VERSION = #{productVersion,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_NUM = #{userNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SECT_NUM = #{sectNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, BACK_TE_NAME = #{backTeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_CSP_ID = #{regCspId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where CSP_ID = #{cspId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
